I'm not married, but I have a fitness tracker that helps me stay motivated and track my progress.
i m from austin , texas.
i look forward to retiring.
i play many instruments.
i work a dead end 9 to 5 job as a snakeskin oil salesman.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing alright, how about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! What are some of your hobbies?
I love to play music and I'm a big fan of fitness.
That's awesome! I love to read and explore new places.
Where are some of your favorite places to explore?
I love exploring the country side and the beach. I'm also a big fan of traveling to different countries.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to travel the world.
It's definitely worth it! What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love getting to play music and I enjoy interacting with customers.
That sounds like a great job! What's your favorite instrument to play?
I love playing the guitar and the piano. I'm also learning to play the drums.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar.
It's not too difficult to learn! I'm sure you could do it.
I'll have to give it a try. Thanks for the conversation!
No problem! Have a nice day!
